title: Earn top-flight IT certifications with this CompTIA training bundle for under $65
content:
Macworld

Certification is key among IT professionals. But while more than 90% of IT experts have at least one certification, fewer than 25% hold a coveted CompTIA A+ certification, an entry-level qualification on foundational IT knowledge that means you’ve proven yourself in the eyes of the world’s most recognized international tech community.

Become an acknowledged CompTIA-certified IT pro with the training found in The Complete 2024 CompTIA Certification Training Super Bundle by IDUNOVA. And right now, this stellar collection is available at the best price you’ll find anywhere on the web.

This package features all the basics, 15 courses packed with over 260 hours of instruction in all the most popular and most widely used certification training that CompTIA offers.

After working through courses in IT Fundamentals and CompTIA’s core A+ training, additional coursework rounds out a learner’s knowledge, helping them understand all the concepts and use cases for handling all manner of IT projects.

From cloud-based systems to networking to security protocols, each course expands a learner’s skill set. Meanwhile, courses present information tailored to helping students pass each of those prestigious CompTIA certification areas.

All 15 courses are conducted by IDUNOVA, a 20-year veteran of online IT training led by respected industry experts. Users will have access to new, updated 2024 content that reflects the current technology and practices. And the best part is that you can learn at your own pace and from the comfort of your own home.

With courses valued at $39 each, this collection would usually cost nearly $600. But as part of this new year savings blowout sale, the entire course bundle is on sale now at just $64.97. But you’ll only score that best-on-the-web pricing if you complete your purchase by 11:59 p.m. PT on Jan. 7.

 

The Complete 2024 CompTIA Certification Training Super Bundle by IDUNOVA – $64.97
